ygData.subject: SV: Anyone else see this on lung? 50 charges goes to 1 when you give it to someone?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ohhh ok didnt know that kewl :-) Askur ... From: dlobdell  To:  Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 9:46 PM

Ohhh ok didnt know that kewl :-)


Askur
